使沉默（silence的过去分词形式）；使安静

word_group.brief_definition: 沉默是金, 什么也不说最好
保持缄默协定；攻守同盟
保持沉默；坚持沉默；静默
默默受苦；默默忍受；默默承受
无线电静默；保持无线电静默

bilingual.source: He broke the silence with a fillip.

bilingual.target: 他的沉默胜过千言万语。
她的沉默预示了她的不满。
一声突然的噗打破了沉默。
不要误解我的沉默为同意。
他的沉默可能表示不赞成。

bilingual.source: His silence is a sign that he is angry.
bilingual.target: 他的沉默是他生气的征兆。

bilingual.source: We need something to break the silence.
bilingual.target: 我们需要某事来打破沉默。

bilingual.source: The momento of silence was very moving.
bilingual.target: 那个瞬间的沉默非常感人。

list.abstract: silence（英[ˈsaɪləns]，美[ˈsaɪləns]），英语单词，作名词为寂静；沉默；静默。作动词为使沉默；使安静；使哑口无言。短语搭配有silence is golden（沉默是金，什么也不说最好）。例句为“Silence is death for any idea.（沉默对任何想法都是致命的。）” silence相关近义词有still、quiescence等，相关反义词有sound、louden。
杨乃文最新专辑，在两年内历经许多人的期盼和等待，终于出炉。制作人林暐哲和杨乃文这两年，耗尽心力全在真实的创作音乐。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Uncomfortable silence it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那就诡异地沉默着吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, how is this better than uncomfortable silence?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，这样还不如诡异地沉默呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, at least she had some silence once in awhile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被关在里面的女的偶尔还能"沉默"[清静]一会呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, of course, lambs are scarier. Otherwise the movie would've been called Silence of the Ducks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，羊肉比较恐怖。不然那部电影（《沉默的羔羊》）就会改为 “沉默的鸭子”了。

yingyinNormal.en: That means that for 18 years from where you sit to where I stand, my silence implied that everything was okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也就是说 毕业后我有18年时间都保持着沉默，这种沉默似乎是在说 一切像这样就行了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: And I've already ruled out "worse than that girl-pit in Silence of the Lambs."
yingyinNormal.zh: 不许说"比《沉默的羔羊》里的囚禁井还可怕"。

yingyinNormal.en: You haven't been down here before, have you? Silence Of The Lambs, basically.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你从来没下来过吧？基本上就像《沉默的羔羊》那样。

yingyinNormal.en: And the only possible reaction to seeing them and walking among them was silence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但看着他们或者游走其中的反应就只可能有一种，那就是沉默。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he broke his long silence and shared his thoughts with us through that old man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他打破了长期的沉默并通过一个送信的老头与我们分享他的意见。

yingyinNormal.en: Silence in the court. Silence in the court. All rise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肃静，肃静。全体起立。

yingyinNormal.en: Silence. The next person who laughs will never laugh again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肃静.谁要再笑一声，一辈子别想再笑。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: But in that solemn silence is heard the whisper of every sleeping things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有寂寞至此才能听到沉睡者在梦中的呓语。

yingyinNormal.en: Go on phase two. Years of mandated hiding and silence have made us bitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 进入第二阶段。多年来的躲藏和静默让我们萌生出不满。

yingyinNormal.en: My affections and wishes have not changed. But one word from you will silence me for ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的心愿和情感依然如旧，只要你说一句话，我便再也不提这桩事。

yingyinNormal.en: You must prove yourself to the Khanate. Until you do, until you silence all doubters, I must be strong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须向汗国证明你自己，在你证明自己前，在你让心存质疑者闭嘴前，我必须保持强大。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. President, is this a way to silence Secretary Durant after Louisiana put her in the running for president?
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统先生，这是为了堵国务卿杜兰特的嘴吗，在路易斯安娜州把她推入总统竞选后？

yingyinNormal.en: And a really good comeback for chicken legs, because "I know you are, but what am I?" was met with stony silence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有帮我想怎么回敬人家笑我小鸡脚，因为我回他"你才是小鸡腿，你们全家都是小鸡腿"，他只无语的藐视我。

yingyinNormal.en: I refuse to be shocked! But, what will you say when Mr Gregson walks through the door, with a full explanation for his silence?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不许说这种话，可如果哪天格莱格森先生回来了，对他的消失做出了合理的解释。你要怎么跟他说。

yingyinNormal.en: If there's a silence then turned that into a joke. Stay natural, self-facing and the audience will be on your side. Let's recap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果观众不笑，就当作自我解嘲。保持自然，忠实呈现自我这样观众就会喜欢你了。再复习一遍！
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, just to save you from further awkwardness, know that I'm perfectly comfortable with the two of us climbing the stairs in silence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 潘妮，为了避免你感觉更加尴尬，如果我们两个安安静静地走上楼，我完全没有意见。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 安静的；寂静的；无声的；默默的；不作声的；不说出的；不发音的；未谈及的；未记录的

examination_example.sentence: On average, participants who followed this instruction felt better than those who had been told to stand or sit in <highlight>silence</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 平均而言，遵循这一指导的参与者比那些被要求站立或静坐的参与者感觉更好。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: I soon realized that the <highlight>silence</highlight> was not unpleasant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很快意识到这种沉默并没有令人不快。

examination_example.sentence: In these cultures, <highlight>silence</highlight> is a call for reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些文化中，沉默是为了激发反思。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Silence</highlight> may be viewed by some cultural groups as extremely uncomfortable; therefore attempts may be made to fill every gap (间隙) with conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些文化群体看来，沉默可能会让人极不舒服；因此，可以尝试用对话来填补每一个间隙。

examination_example.sentence: Persons in Asian cultures may view <highlight>silence</highlight> as a sign of respect, particularly to an elder or a person in authority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在亚洲文化中，人们可能视沉默为尊重的标志，尤其是对长辈或权威人士。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: If you work in total <highlight>silence</highlight>, that’s OK; too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你完全沉默地工作，那也没关系。

examination_example.sentence: Gradually, the peace and <highlight>silence</highlight> of the place began to fill my mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 渐渐地，这个地方的宁静开始充斥我的脑海。
你需要沉默来集中注意力吗？

examination_example.sentence: The six-minute speech <highlight>silenced</highlight> all the people and made them fall into deep thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 六分钟的演讲让所有人都沉默了下来，让他们陷入了沉思。
